references.reason: This paper lays the theoretical foundation for kernel methods, which are central to the proposed InfiNet architecture.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This work is highly influential in introducing the Transformer architecture to computer vision, which InfiNet builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: ResNet is a highly influential architecture in deep learning which the InfiNet architecture is based on.
This foundational paper introduces the Transformer architecture and its self-attention mechanism, which are key components of many modern neural network architectures including InfiNet.
ConvNeXt provides a strong baseline architecture for image classification which InfiNet directly compares against and improves upon.
